projects.description: In a recent project, I developed an Airways crew management system using React, Redux, AG-Grid-React, and Webpack. The system managed crew notes, inquiries, performance plans, and meeting schedules. I created user-friendly modules and integrating backend APIs.

I designed responsive UIs with React.js for ecommerce, enterprise, and healthcare apps, using Redux for state management, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and implementing authentication. I developed reusable components, streamlined forms, ensured code quality, and collaborated in Agile Scrum while mentoring juniors
